UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: AurH1: a new heptapeptide derived from Aurein1.2 antimicrobial peptide with specific and exclusive fungicidal activity.
Literature.Author: Madanchi H, Khalaj V, Jang S, Shabani AA, Ebrahimi Kiasari R, Seyed Mousavi SJ, Kazemi Sealani S, Sardari S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human skin fibroblasts:9.71% Cytotoxicity=1000 µg/ml,Human skin fibroblasts:IC50=>1000 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:3.43% Hemolysis=1000 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=16±0.2µg/ml),Candida glabrata ATCC 90030(MIC=125±1.7µg/ml),Candida krusei ATCC 28870(MIC=32±0.4µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 2517(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Penicillium pinophilum ATCC 9644(MIC=64±0.0µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes ATCC 32510(MIC=62.5±0.8µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 1022(MIC=7.3±0.5µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 9142(MIC=125±1.7µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus ATCC 24109(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Microsporum canis PTCC 5069(MIC=125±1.7µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae PTCC 5052(MIC=16±0.0µg/ml)
